title: How to Make a Sweet Honey and Cinnamon Milk Drink

steps.headline: Add sugar,berries cinnamon and honey (or honey substitute).
Heat over warm stove.
steps.description: Mix gently. Do not allow to boil.

text: Pour milk into a saucepan.  Add sugar,berries cinnamon and honey (or honey substitute).  Heat over warm stove. Mix gently. Do not allow to boil. Remove from stove when heated.
